tool_description: Monitors transaction velocity patterns to detect unusual spending behaviors and potential fraud attempts.

time_window_minutes.description: Time window for velocity checking in minutes

error_messages: Invalid customer ID: Customer ID must be a non-empty string.
Invalid transaction amount: Amount must be a positive number.
Invalid time window: Time window must be a positive integer representing minutes.
Velocity limit exceeded: Transaction would exceed established velocity limits.
Historical data unavailable: Cannot perform velocity check due to insufficient transaction history.
usage: Provide customer_id and transaction_amount. Optionally set time_window_minutes and spending limits. Returns velocity analysis and flags.

transactions_in_window.description: Number of transactions in the specified time window

amount_in_window.description: Total amount spent in the time window
